response.overview: For 60 years, Erik has worked with the same kinds of tasks, yet no two days are ever the same. Digging the foundation for a house, moving a small cabin, or placing a floating dock in the sea for summer swimming—there’s a lot of variety, and there’s always plenty of work to do. Many people in the area have received Erik’s help, both with big and small things, and he’s appreciated for his skill and his big heart. Soon it will be time to retire, but that’s not so easy when work and free time blend together.  Fråga ChatGPT
response.title: Erik: ett personporträtt
